titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Bulgaria
Bulgaria

div.head: Legislation
div.p: New legislation may change the current law soon, but will most likely improve access rather than inhibit it. Currently, materials prior to 1944 are found at the Central State Archives. For materials after 1944, researchers are advised to contact the Diplomatic Archives at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs. The early period has been reviewed and declassified. The process for later years is on-going, though unclassified documents are accessible.

div.head: Location
div.p: Central State Archives: Sofia 1000, 5 Moskovska Str.
Diplomatic Archives at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs: Sofia 1040, 2 Alexander Zhendov Str.

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Foreign researchers should contact the archive at least thirty days in advance of visit.

div.head: Published Documents
div.p: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs has no regular series of published documents. However, it has produced individual volumes elaborating particular themes in Bulgarian History.
